title: Fire escape and egress inspection certificates
dataVerified: Building address, fire escape location, inspector, inspection date, structural integrity
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Inspection status (passed/conditional). Link to structural engineer/building inspector system (building owners and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake fire escape certificates. Domain binding verifies structural engineer/building inspector. Life safety critical. Building code compliance. Prevents fire escape collapse liability.
